snippet: Spain’s soccer federation said it was suspending league and cup matches starting May 16 in protest of a proposed law on the sale of television rights and the division of the revenue.
abstract: Spain's soccer federation will suspend league and cup matches in protest of proposed law regarding sale of television rights and division of revenue.
lead_paragraph: Spain’s soccer federation said it was suspending league and cup matches starting May 16 in protest of a proposed law on the sale of television rights and the division of the revenue.

headline.main: Spain Will Suspend League and Cup Matches
